long_description: Designed for mountain biking but great for any activity, the Julbo Stunt sunglasses offer style, performance and solid eye protection. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Nylon frame wraps close around the face for excellent peripheral protection. GripTech curved temples keep glasses in place, and can be worn under a helmet without sacrificing comfort. GripNose nose pads become tacky as you perspire, further helping keep eyewear in place. The Julbo Stunt sunglasses Include a protective case.
short_description: Designed for mountain biking but great for any activity, the Julbo Stunt sunglasses offer style, performance and solid eye protection.
